entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 17 March 2023
